location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morrier, Secretary at Khoush Khona, to Andrew Jukes Esq.

mods.abstract: Letter from James Morrier, Secretary at Khoush Khona, to Andrew Jukes Esq., acknowledging the letter sent to Sir Harford Jones on 24 January 1809 and sending two packets, one for the Governor of Bombay and the other for Brigadier General John Malcolm (not enclosed).
